name: MorphicReality
tag_list: iphone, android, blackberry, windows-mobile, ruby, ror, python, php, augmented-reality, enterprise-mobile-solutions, mobile-solutions-roadmap-consulting, it-consultancy
overview:
Morphic Reality is an emerging provider of cross platform Mobile Solutions to businesses worldwide. We specialize in delivering Mobile Solutions making your life simpler.

We see Mobile Solutions as a creative and innovative activity, best done by teams of likeminded people.

With a deep understanding of XP, Agile principles and IT industry’s best practices, Morphic Reality has the experience and background to deliver beautifully engineered, well tested and scalable mobile solutions.

Our hiring model focuses on finding outstanding talent who like to push the boundaries in cutting edge Mobile Technologies.

Specialties Mobile (iPhone,Android, Blackberry and Windows Mobile), Open Source Solutions (Ruby, RoR, Python, PHP), Augmented Reality, Enterprise Mobile Solutions, Mobile Solutions Roadmap Consulting, IT Consultancy
